document.full_text: but amid the celebratory vibe around him and v.c.u., shaka smart received sad news on tuesday morning when his 90-year-old grandfather, walter king, died after a stay in the hospital while in failing health.
document.title: shaka smart continues despite personal loss
lines_and_colors: but amid the celebratory vibe around him and v.c.u., shaka smart received sad news on tuesday morning when his 90-year-old grandfather, walter king, died after a stay in the hospital while in failing health.
